name: Y.A.N.A
description:
Heya there my hushpuppies, it's Eacconger and I got a new interactive story for you all! Just as a warning, the topics covered in this game are kind of heavy and the main theme of this game is mental health. I cannot stress enough that I am not representing any specific mental health issue or condition in this game. I am simply just telling a story. When making this, I had no specific mental health issue in mind, and I just want to let you all know that!

Y.A.N.A is a 9 to 10 minute long story based game about you, Jinnie, speaking to a young boy named Mateo through the Y.A.N.A Mental Health Hotline.

But the truth behind Mateo and the reason why he messaged Y.A.N.A is up to you to figure out.

Hope you enjoy! Stay safe my dudes ✌

Oh, also, here's a video of me playing the game!
